words.translation: (Has) approached|for [the] mankind|their account|while they|(are) in|heedlessness|turning away

translations.1: Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaabuhum Wa-hum fee ghaflatim mu'ridoon
translations.2: Iqtaraba lilnnasi hisabuhum wahum fee ghaflatin muAAridoona

words.translation: Not|comes to them|of|a Reminder|from|their Lord|anew|except|they listen to it|while they|(are at) play

translations.1: Maa ya'teehim min zikrim mir Rabbihim muhdasin illas tama'oohu Wa-hum yal'aboon
translations.2: Ma yateehim min thikrin min rabbihim muhdathin illa istamaAAoohu wahum yalAAaboona

words.translation: Distracted|their hearts|And they conceal|the private conversation|those who|[they] wronged|Is|this|except|a human being|like you|So would you approach|the magic|while you|see (it)

translations.1: Laahiyatan quloobuhum; Wa-asarrun najwal lazeena zalamoo hal haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum 'afa-ta'toonas sihra Wa-antum tubsiroon
translations.2: Lahiyatan quloobuhum waasarroo alnnajwa allatheena thalamoo hal hatha illa basharun mithlukum afatatoona alssihra waantum tubsiroona

words.translation: He said|My Lord|knows|the word|in|the heavens|and the earth|And He|(is) the All-Hearer|the All-Knower

translations.1: Qaala Rabbee ya'lamul qawla fis samaaa'i wal-ardi Wa-Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
translations.2: Qala rabbee yaAAlamu alqawla fee alssamai waalardi wahuwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu

words.translation: Nay|they say|Muddled|dreams|nay|he (has) invented it|nay|he|(is) a poet|So let him bring us|a sign|like what|was sent|(to) the former

translations.1: Bal qaalooo adghaasu ahlaamin bal iftaraahu bal huwa shaa'irun fal-ya'tinaa bi-Aayatin kamaa ursilal awwaloon
translations.2: Bal qaloo adghathu ahlamin bali iftarahu bal huwa shaAAirun falyatina biayatin kama orsila alawwaloona

words.translation: Not|believed|before them|any|town|which We destroyed|so will they|believe

translations.1: Maaa aaamanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa a-fahum yu'minoon
translations.2: Ma amanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaha afahum yuminoona

words.translation: And not|We sent|before you|except|men|We revealed|to them|So ask|(the) people|(of) the Reminder|if|you|(do) not|know

translations.1: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim fas'aloo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon
translations.2: Wama arsalna qablaka illa rijalan noohee ilayhim faisaloo ahla alththikri in kuntum la taAAlamoona

words.translation: And not|We made them|bodies|not|eating|the food|and not|they were|immortals

translations.1: Wa-maa ja'alnaahum jasadal laa ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-maa kaanoo khaalideen
translations.2: Wama jaAAalnahum jasadan la yakuloona alttaAAama wama kanoo khalideena

words.translation: Then|We fulfilled (for) them|the promise|and We saved them|and whom|We willed|and We destroyed|the transgressors

translations.1: Summa sadaqnaa-humul wa'da fa-anjainaahum Wa-man nashaaa'u Wa-ahlaknal musrifeen
translations.2: Thumma sadaqnahumu alwaAAda faanjaynahum waman nashao waahlakna almusrifeena

words.translation: Indeed|We (have) sent down|to you|a Book|in it|(is) your mention|Then will not|you use reason

translations.1: Laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum afalaa ta'qiloon
translations.2: Laqad anzalna ilaykum kitaban feehi thikrukum afala taAAqiloona

words.translation: And how many|We (have) shattered|of|a town|(that) was|unjust|and We produced|after them|another people|another people

translations.1: Wa-kam qasamnaa min qaryatin kaanat zaalimatanw Wa-ansha'-naa ba'dahaa qawman aakhareen
translations.2: Wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanat thalimatan waanshana baAAdaha qawman akhareena

words.translation: Then when|they perceived|Our torment|behold|they|from it|were fleeing

translations.1: Falammaaa ahassoo ba'sanaaa izaa hum minhaa yarkudoon
translations.2: Falamma ahassoo basana itha hum minha yarkudoona

words.translation: Flee not|Flee not|but return|to|what|you were given luxury|in it|and to your homes|so that you may|be questioned

translations.1: Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo ilaa maaa utriftum feehi Wa-masaakinikum la'allakum tus'aloon
translations.2: La tarkudoo wairjiAAoo ila ma otriftum feehi wamasakinikum laAAallakum tusaloona

words.translation: They said|O woe to us!|Indeed [we]|we were|wrongdoers

translations.1: Qaaloo yaa-wailanaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
translations.2: Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna thalimeena

words.translation: Then not|ceased|[this]|their cry|until|We made them|reaped|extinct

translations.1: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen
translations.2: Fama zalat tilka daAAwahum hatta jaAAalnahum haseedan khamideena

words.translation: And not|We created|the heavens|and the earth|and what|(is) between them|(for) playing

translations.1: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa laa'ibeen
translations.2: Wama khalaqna alssamaa waalarda wama baynahuma laAAibeena

words.translation: If|We intended|that|We take|a pastime|surely We (could have) taken it|from|Us|if|We were|doers

translations.1: Law aradnaaa an nattakhiza lahwal lat-takhaznaahu mil ladunnaaa in kunnaa faa'ileen
translations.2: Law aradna an nattakhitha lahwan laittakhathnahu min ladunna in kunna faAAileena

words.translation: Nay|We hurl|the truth|against|[the] falsehood|and it breaks its head|behold|it (is)|vanishing|And for you|(is) destruction|for what|you ascribe

translations.1: Bal naqzifu bilhaqqi 'alal baatili fa-yadmaghuhoo fa-izaa huwa zaahiq; Wa-lakumul wailu mimmaa tasifoon
translations.2: Bal naqthifu bialhaqqi AAala albatili fayadmaghuhu faitha huwa zahiqun walakumu alwaylu mimma tasifoona

words.translation: And to Him (belongs)|whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and the earth|And (those) who|(are) near Him|not|they are arrogant|to|worship Him|and not|they tire

translations.1: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaada-tihee Wa-laa yastahsiroon
translations.2: Walahu man fee alssamawati waalardi waman AAindahu la yastakbiroona AAan AAibadatihi wala yastahsiroona

words.translation: They glorify (Him)|[the] night|and [the] day|not|they slacken

translations.1: Yusabbihoona laila wannahaara laa yafturoon
translations.2: Yusabbihoona allayla waalnnahara la yafturoona

words.translation: Or|(have) they taken|gods|from|the earth|they|raise (the dead)

translations.1: Amit takhazooo aalihatam minal ardi hum yunshiroon
translations.2: Ami ittakhathoo alihatan mina alardi hum yunshiroona

words.translation: If|(there) were|in both of them|gods|besides|Allah|surely they (would) have been ruined|So glorified|(is) Allah|Lord|(of) the Throne|(above) what|they attribute

translations.1: Law kaana feehimaaa aalihatun illal laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
translations.2: Law kana feehima alihatun illa Allahu lafasadata fasubhana Allahi rabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoona

words.translation: Not|He (can) be questioned|about what|He does|but they|will be questioned

translations.1: Laa yus'alu 'ammaa yaf'alu Wa-hum yus'aloon
translations.2: La yusalu AAamma yafAAalu wahum yusaloona

words.translation: Or|(have) they taken|besides Him|besides Him|gods|Say|Bring|your proof|This|(is) a Reminder|(for those) who|(are) with me|and a Reminder|(for those) who|(were) before me|But|most of them|(do) not|know|the truth|so they|(are) averse

translations.1: Amit takhazoo min doonihee aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haaza zikru mam ma'iya Wa-zikru man qablee; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal haqqa fahum mu'ridoon
translations.2: Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan qul hatoo burhanakum hatha thikru man maAAiya wathikru man qablee bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona alhaqqa fahum muAAridoona

words.translation: And not|We sent|before you|before you|any|Messenger|but|We reveal(ed)|to him|that [He]|(There is) no|god|except|Me|so worship Me

translations.1: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolin illaa nooheee ilaihi annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa Ana fa'budoon
translations.2: Wama arsalna min qablika min rasoolin illa noohee ilayhi annahu la ilaha illa ana faoAAbudooni

words.translation: And they say|Has taken|the Most Gracious|a son|Glorified is He!|Nay|(they are) slaves|honored

translations.1: Wa-qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa; Subhaanahu bal 'ibaadum mukramoon
translations.2: Waqaloo ittakhatha alrrahmanu waladan subhanahu bal AAibadun mukramoona

words.translation: Not|they (can) precede Him|in word|and they|by His command|act

translations.1: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bil-qawli Wa-hum bi-amrihee ya'maloon
translations.2: La yasbiqoonahu bialqawli wahum biamrihi yaAAmaloona

words.translation: He knows|what|(is) before them|(is) before them|and what|(is) behind them|and not|they (can) intercede|except|for whom|He approves|And they|from|fear of Him|stand in awe

translations.1: Ya'lamu maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yashfa'oona illaa limanir tadaa Wa-hum min khash-yatihee mushfiqoon
translations.2: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum wala yashfaAAoona illa limani irtada wahum min khashyatihi mushfiqoona

words.translation: And whoever|says|of them|Indeed, I am|a god|besides Him|besides Him|Then that|We will recompense|(with) Hell|Thus|We recompense|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-main yaqul minhum inneee ilaahum min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi Jahannam; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen
translations.2: Waman yaqul minhum innee ilahun min doonihi fathalika najzeehi jahannama kathalika najzee alththalimeena

words.translation: Do not|see|those who|disbelieved|that|the heavens|and the earth|were|a joined entity|then We parted them|and We made|from|[the] water|every|living thing|living thing|Then will not|they believe

translations.1: Awalam yaral lazeena kafarooo annas samaawaati wal-arda kaanataa ratqan fafataqnaa-humaa Wa-ja'alnaa minal maaa'i kulla shai'in haiyin afalaa yu'minoon
translations.2: Awalam yara allatheena kafaroo anna alssamawati waalarda kanata ratqan fafataqnahuma wajaAAalna mina almai kulla shayin hayyin afala yuminoona

words.translation: And We (have) placed|in|the earth|firmly set mountains|lest|it (should) shake|with them|and We made|therein|broad passes|(as) ways|so that they may|(be) guided

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bihim Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa fijaajan subulal la'allahum yahtadoon
translations.2: WajaAAalna fee alardi rawasiya an tameeda bihim wajaAAalna feeha fijajan subulan laAAallahum yahtadoona

words.translation: And We made|the sky|a roof|protected|But they|from|its Signs|turn away

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnas samaaa'a saqfam mahfoozanw Wa-hum 'an Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon
translations.2: WajaAAalna alssamaa saqfan mahfoothan wahum AAan ayatiha muAAridoona

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|created|the night|and the day|and the sun|and the moon|each|in|an orbit|floating

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqal laila wannahaara washshamsa wal-qamara kullun fee falakiny yasbahoon
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa allayla waalnnahara waalshshamsa waalqamara kullun fee falakin yasbahoona

words.translation: And not|We made|for any man|before you|before you|[the] immortality|so if|you die|then (would) they|live forever

translations.1: Wa-maa ja'alnaa libasharim min qablikal khuld; afa immitta fahumul khaalidoon
translations.2: Wama jaAAalna libasharin min qablika alkhulda afain mitta fahumu alkhalidoona

words.translation: Every|soul|(will) taste|[the] death|And We test you|with [the] bad|and [the] good|(as) a trial|and to Us|you will be returned

translations.1: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawt; Wa-nablookum bi-sharri walkhairi fitnatanw Wa-ilainaa turja'oon
translations.2: Kullu nafsin thaiqatu almawti wanablookum bialshsharri waalkhayri fitnatan wailayna turjaAAoona

words.translation: And when|you see|those who|disbelieve|not|they take you|except|(in) ridicule|Is this|the one who|mentions|your gods|And they|at (the) mention|(of) the Most Gracious|[they]|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-izaa ra-aakal lazeena kafarooo ien yattakhizoonaka illa huzuwan; ahaazal lazee yazkuru aalihatakum Wa-hum bi-zikrir Rahmaani hum kaafiroon
translations.2: Waitha raaka allatheena kafaroo in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee yathkuru alihatakum wahum bithikri alrrahmani hum kafiroona

words.translation: Is created|the man|of|haste|I will show you|My Signs|so (do) not|ask Me to hasten

translations.1: Khuliqal insaanu min 'ajal; sa-ureekum Aayaatee falaa tasta'jiloon
translations.2: Khuliqa alinsanu min AAajalin saoreekum ayatee fala tastaAAjiloona

words.translation: And they say|When (will be fulfilled)|this|promise|if|you are|truthful

translations.1: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
translations.2: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena

words.translation: If|knew|those who|disbelieved|(the) time|(when) not|they will avert|from|their faces|the Fire|and not|from|their backs|and not|they|will be helped!

translations.1: Law ya'lamul lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw wujoohihimun Naara Wa-laa 'an zuhoorihim Wa-laa hum yunsaroon
translations.2: Law yaAAlamu allatheena kafaroo heena la yakuffoona AAan wujoohihimu alnnara wala AAan thuhoorihim wala hum yunsaroona

words.translation: Nay|it will come to them|unexpectedly|and bewilder them|then not|they will be able|to repel it|and not|they|will be given respite

translations.1: Bal ta'teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastatee'oona raddahaa Wa-laa hum yunzaroon
translations.2: Bal tateehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum fala yastateeAAoona raddaha wala hum yuntharoona

words.translation: And verily|were mocked|Messengers|before you|before you|then surrounded|those who|mocked|from them|what|they used|at it|(to) mock

translations.1: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
translations.2: Walaqadi istuhzia birusulin min qablika fahaqa biallatheena sakhiroo minhum ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona

words.translation: Say|Who|(can) protect you|in the night|and the day|from|the Most Gracious|Yet|they|from|(the) remembrance|(of) their Lord|turn away

translations.1: Qul main yakla-'ukum billaili wannahaari minar Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri Rabbihim mu'ridoon
translations.2: Qul man yaklaokum biallayli waalnnahari mina alrrahmani bal hum AAan thikri rabbihim muAAridoona

words.translation: Or|have they|gods|(to) defend them|from|Us|Not|they are able|(to) help|themselves|and not|they|from Us|can be protected

translations.1: Am lahum aalihatun tamna'uhum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oona nasra anfusihim Wa-laa hum minna yus-haboon
translations.2: Am lahum alihatun tamnaAAuhum min doonina la yastateeAAoona nasra anfusihim wala hum minna yushaboona

words.translation: Nay|We gave provision|(to) these|and their fathers|until|grew long|for them|the life|Then do not|they see|that We|We come|(to) the land|We reduce it|from|its borders|So is (it) they|(who will be) overcoming

translations.1: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala 'alaihimul 'umur; afalaa yarawna anna na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; afahumul ghaaliboon
translations.2: Bal mattaAAna haolai waabaahum hatta tala AAalayhimu alAAumuru afala yarawna anna natee alarda nanqusuha min atrafiha afahumu alghaliboona

words.translation: Say|Only|I warn you|by the revelation|But not|hear|the deaf|the call|when|when|they are warned

translations.1: Qul innamaaa unzirukum bilwahyi; Wa-laa yasma'us summud du'aaa-'a izaa maa yunzaroon
translations.2: Qul innama onthirukum bialwahyi wala yasmaAAu alssummu aldduAAaa itha ma yuntharoona

words.translation: And if|touches them|a whiff|of|(the) punishment|(of) your Lord|surely they will say|O woe to us!|Indeed we|[we] were|wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-la'in massat-hum nafhatun min 'azaabi Rabbika la-yaqoolunna yaawailanaaa innnaa kunnaa zaalimeen
translations.2: Walain massathum nafhatun min AAathabi rabbika layaqoolunna ya waylana inna kunna thalimeena

words.translation: And We set|the scales|(of) the justice|for (the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|so not|will be wronged|any soul|(in) anything|And if|(there) be|weight|(of) a seed|of|a mustard|We will bring|[with] it|And sufficient|(are) We|(as) Reckoners

translations.1: Wa-nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li-Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shai'aa; Wa-in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; Wa-kafaa binaa haasibeen
translations.2: WanadaAAu almawazeena alqista liyawmi alqiyamati fala tuthlamu nafsun shayan wain kana mithqala habbatin min khardalin atayna biha wakafa bina hasibeena

words.translation: And verily|We gave|Musa|and Harun|the Criterion|and a light|and a Reminder|for the righteous

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosa Wa-haaroonal Furqaana Wa-diyaa'anw Wa-zikral lilmuttaqeen
translations.2: Walaqad atayna moosa waharoona alfurqana wadiyaan wathikran lilmuttaqeena

words.translation: Those who|fear|their Lord|in the unseen|and they|of|the Hour|(are) afraid

translations.1: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon
translations.2: Allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi wahum mina alssaAAati mushfiqoona

words.translation: And this|(is) a Reminder|blessed|which We (have) revealed|Then are you|of it|rejecters

translations.1: Wa-haazaa Zikrum Mubaarakun anzalnaah; afa-antum lahoo munkiroon
translations.2: Wahatha thikrun mubarakun anzalnahu afaantum lahu munkiroona

words.translation: And verily|We gave|Ibrahim|his guidance|before|before|and We were|about him|Well-Knowing

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu Wa-kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen
translations.2: Walaqad atayna ibraheema rushdahu min qablu wakunna bihi AAalimeena

words.translation: When|he said|to his father|and his people|What|(are) these|[the] statues|which|you|to it|(are) devoted

translations.1: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahaa 'aakifoon
translations.2: Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi ma hathihi alttamatheelu allatee antum laha AAakifoona

words.translation: They said|We found|our forefathers|of them|worshippers

translations.1: Qaaloo wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa lahaa 'aabideen
translations.2: Qaloo wajadna abaana laha AAabideena

words.translation: He said|Verily|you are|[you]|and your forefathers|(were) in|an error|manifest

translations.1: Qaala laqad kuntum antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalin mubeen
translations.2: Qala laqad kuntum antum waabaokum fee dalalin mubeenin

words.translation: They said|Have you come to us|with the truth|or|you|(are) of|those who play

translations.1: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil-haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen
translations.2: Qaloo ajitana bialhaqqi am anta mina allaAAibeena

words.translation: He said|Nay|your Lord|(is the) Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|the One Who|created them|and I am|to|that|of|the witnesses

translations.1: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardil lazee fatarahunna Wa-ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen
translations.2: Qala bal rabbukum rabbu alssamawati waalardi allathee fatarahunna waana AAala thalikum mina alshshahideena

words.translation: And by Allah|surely I will plan|(against) your idols|after|[that]|you go away|turning (your) backs

translations.1: Wa-tallaahi la-akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen
translations.2: WataAllahi laakeedanna asnamakum baAAda an tuwalloo mudbireena

words.translation: So he made them|(into) pieces|except|a large (one)|of them|so that they may|to it|return

translations.1: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon
translations.2: FajaAAalahum juthathan illa kabeeran lahum laAAallahum ilayhi yarjiAAoona

words.translation: They said|Who|(has) done|this|to our gods|Indeed he|(is) of|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi-aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen
translations.2: Qaloo man faAAala hatha bialihatina innahu lamina alththalimeena

words.translation: They said|We heard|a youth|mention them|he is called|he is called|Ibrahim

translations.1: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo ibraaheem
translations.2: Qaloo samiAAna fatan yathkuruhum yuqalu lahu ibraheemu

words.translation: They said|Then bring|him|before|(the) eyes|(of) the people|so that they may|bear witness

translations.1: Qaaloo fa'too bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash-hadoon
translations.2: Qaloo fatoo bihi AAala aAAyuni alnnasi laAAallahum yashhadoona

words.translation: They said|Have you|done|this|to our gods|O Ibrahim

translations.1: Qaalooo 'a-anta fa'alta haazaa bi-aalihatinaa yaaa-ibraaheem
translations.2: Qaloo aanta faAAalta hatha bialihatina ya ibraheemu

words.translation: He said|Nay|(some doer) did it|Their chief|(is) this|So ask them|if|they (can)|speak

translations.1: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon
translations.2: Qala bal faAAalahu kabeeruhum hatha faisaloohum in kanoo yantiqoona

words.translation: So they returned|to|themselves|and said|Indeed you|[you]|(are) the wrongdoers

translations.1: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon
translations.2: FarajaAAoo ila anfusihim faqaloo innakum antumu alththalimoona

words.translation: Then|they were turned|on|their heads|Verily|you know|not|these|(can) speak!

translations.1: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon
translations.2: Thumma nukisoo AAala ruoosihim laqad AAalimta ma haolai yantiqoona

words.translation: He said|Then do you worship|besides|besides|Allah|what|(does) not|benefit you|(in) anything|and not|harms you

translations.1: Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw Wa-laa yadurrukum
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la afataAAbudoona min dooni All<u>a</u>hi m<u>a</u> l<u>a</u> yanfaAAukum shayan wal<u>a</u> ya<u>d</u>urrukum

words.translation: Uff|to you|and to what|you worship|besides|besides|Allah|Then will not|you use reason

translations.1: Uffil lakum Wa-limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon
translations.2: Offin lakum walima taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi afala taAAqiloona

words.translation: They said|Burn him|and support|your gods|if|you are|doers

translations.1: Qaaloo harriqoohu wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen
translations.2: Qaloo harriqoohu waonsuroo alihatakum in kuntum faAAileena

words.translation: We said|O fire!|Be|cool[ness]|and safe[ty]|for|Ibrahim

translations.1: Qulnaa yaa-naaru koonee bardanw Wa-salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem
translations.2: Qulna ya naru koonee bardan wasalaman AAala ibraheema

words.translation: And they intended|for him|a plan|but We made them|the greatest losers

translations.1: Wa-araadoo bihee kaidan faja'alnaahumul akhsareen
translations.2: Waaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumu alakhsareena

words.translation: And We delivered him|and Lut|to|the land|which|We (had) blessed|[in it]|for the worlds

translations.1: Wa-najjainaahu Wa-Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil-'aalameen
translations.2: Wanajjaynahu walootan ila alardi allatee barakna feeha lilAAalameena

words.translation: And We bestowed|on him|Ishaq|and Yaqub|(in) addition|and all|We made|righteous

translations.1: Wa-wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaqa; Wa-Ya'qooba naafilah; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen
translations.2: Wawahabna lahu ishaqa wayaAAqooba nafilatan wakullan jaAAalna saliheena

words.translation: And We made them|leaders|they guide|by Our Command|And We inspired|to them|(the) doing|(of) good deeds|and establishment|(of) the prayer|and giving|(of) zakah|and they were|of Us|worshippers

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa Wa-awhainaaa ilaihim fi'lal khairaati Wa-iqaamas Salaati Wa-eetaaa'az Zakaati Wa-kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen
translations.2: WajaAAalnahum aimmatan yahdoona biamrina waawhayna ilayhim fiAAla alkhayrati waiqama alssalati waeetaa alzzakati wakanoo lana AAabideena

words.translation: And (to) Lut|We gave him|judgment|and knowledge|and We saved him|from|the town|which|was|doing|wicked deeds|Indeed they|were|a people|evil|defiantly disobedient

translations.1: Wa-Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmanw Wa-najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen
translations.2: Walootan ataynahu hukman waAAilman wanajjaynahu mina alqaryati allatee kanat taAAmalu alkhabaitha innahum kanoo qawma sawin fasiqeena

words.translation: And We admitted him|into|Our Mercy|Indeed he|(was) of|the righteous

translations.1: Wa-adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saaliheen
translations.2: Waadkhalnahu fee rahmatina innahu mina alssaliheena

words.translation: And Nuh|when|he called|before|before|so We responded|to him|and We saved him|and his family|from|the affliction|[the] great

translations.1: Wa-noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu Wa-ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem
translations.2: Wanoohan ith nada min qablu faistajabna lahu fanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheemi

words.translation: And We helped him|from|the people|who|denied|Our Signs|Indeed they|were|a people|evil|so We drowned them|all

translations.1: Wa-nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq-naahum ajma'een
translations.2: Wanasarnahu mina alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina innahum kanoo qawma sawin faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: And Dawud|and Sulaiman|when|they judged|concerning|the field|when|pastured|in it|sheep|(of) a people|and We were|to their judgment|witness

translations.1: Wa-Daawooda Wa-Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi ghanamul qawmi Wa-kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen
translations.2: Wadawooda wasulaymana ith yahkumani fee alharthi ith nafashat feehi ghanamu alqawmi wakunna lihukmihim shahideena

words.translation: And We gave understanding of it|(to) Sulaiman|and (to) each|We gave|judgment|and knowledge|And We subjected|with|Dawud|the mountains|(to) glorify Our praises|and the birds|And We were|the Doers

translations.1: Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; Wa-kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw Wa-sakh-kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; Wa-kunnaa faa'ileen
translations.2: Fafahhamnaha sulaymana wakullan atayna hukman waAAilman wasakhkharna maAAa dawooda aljibala yusabbihna waalttayra wakunna faAAileena

words.translation: And We taught him|(the) making|(of) coats of armor|for you|to protect you|from|your battle|Then will|you|(be) grateful

translations.1: Wa-'allamanaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum min ba'sikum fahal antum shaakiroon
translations.2: WaAAallamnahu sanAAata laboosin lakum lituhsinakum min basikum fahal antum shakiroona

words.translation: And to Sulaiman|the wind|forcefully|blowing|by his command|to|the land|which|We blessed|[in it]|And We are|of every|thing|Knowers

translations.1: Wa-li-Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi-amriheee ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa; Wa-kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen
translations.2: Walisulaymana alrreeha AAasifatan tajree biamrihi ila alardi allatee barakna feeha wakunna bikulli shayin AAalimeena

words.translation: And of|the devils|(were some) who|would dive|for him|and would do|work|other than|that|And We were|of them|Guardians

translations.1: Wa-minash Shayaateeni maien yaghoosoona lahoo Wa-ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika Wa-kunna lahum haafizeen
translations.2: Wamina alshshayateeni man yaghoosoona lahu wayaAAmaloona AAamalan doona thalika wakunna lahum hafitheena

words.translation: And Ayub|when|he called|(to) his Lord|Indeed [I]|has touched me|the adversity|and You|(are) Most Merciful|(of) the Merciful

translations.1: Wa-Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru Wa-Anta arhamur raahimeen
translations.2: Waayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya alddurru waanta arhamu alrrahimeena

words.translation: So We responded|to him|and We removed|what|(was) on him|of|(the) adversity|And We gave him|his family|and (the) like thereof|with them|(as) Mercy|from Ourselves|from Ourselves|and a reminder|for the worshippers

translations.1: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf-naa maa bihee min durrinw Wa-aatainaahu ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan min 'indinaa Wa-zikraa lil'aabideen
translations.2: Faistajabna lahu fakashafna ma bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahu wamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan min AAindina wathikra lilAAabideena

words.translation: And Ismail|and Idris|and Dhul-Kifl|and Dhul-Kifl|all|(were) of|the patient ones

translations.1: Wa-Ismaa'eela Wa-Idreesa Wa-Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen
translations.2: WaismaAAeela waidreesa watha alkifli kullun mina alssabireena

words.translation: And We admitted them|in|Our Mercy|Indeed they|(were) of|the righteous

translations.1: Wa-adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen
translations.2: Waadkhalnahum fee rahmatina innahum mina alssaliheena

words.translation: And Dhun-Nun|And Dhun-Nun|when|he went|(while) angry|and thought|that|never|We would decree|upon him|Then he called|in|the darkness(es)|that|(There is) no|god|except|You|Glory be to You|Indeed, [I]|I am|of|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fa-zannaa al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen
translations.2: Watha alnnooni ith thahaba mughadiban fathanna an lan naqdira AAalayhi fanada fee alththulumati an la ilaha illa anta subhanaka innee kuntu mina alththalimeena

words.translation: So We responded|to him|and We saved him|from|the distress|And thus|We save|the believers

translations.1: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-najjainaahu minal ghamm; Wa-kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen
translations.2: Faistajabna lahu wanajjaynahu mina alghammi wakathalika nunjee almumineena

words.translation: And Zakariya|when|he called|(to) his Lord|My Lord!|(Do) not|leave me|alone|while You|(are) [the] Best|(of) the inheritors

translations.1: Wa-Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw Wa-Anta khairul waariseen
translations.2: Wazakariyya ith nada rabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheena

words.translation: So We responded|to him|and We bestowed|on him|Yahya|and We cured|for him|his wife|Indeed they|used (to)|hasten|in|good deeds|and they supplicate to Us|(in) hope|and fear|and they were|to Us|humbly submissive

translations.1: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa-aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-yad'oonanaa raghabanw Wa-rahabaa; Wa-kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een
translations.2: Faistajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya waaslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanoo yusariAAoona fee alkhayrati wayadAAoonana raghaban warahaban wakanoo lana khashiAAeena

words.translation: And she who|guarded|her chastity|so We breathed|into her|of|Our Spirit|and We made her|and her son|a sign|for the worlds

translations.1: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa min roohinaa Wa-ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatan lil'aalameen
translations.2: Waallatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feeha min roohina wajaAAalnaha waibnaha ayatan lilAAalameena

words.translation: Indeed|this|(is) your religion|religion|one|and I Am|your Lord|so worship Me

translations.1: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon
translations.2: Inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatan waana rabbukum faoAAbudooni

words.translation: But they cut off|their affair|among themselves|all|to Us|(will) return

translations.1: Wa-taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon
translations.2: WataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahum kullun ilayna rajiAAoona

words.translation: Then whoever|does|[of]|[the] righteous deeds|while he|(is) a believer|then not|(will be) rejected|[of] his effort|And indeed We|of it|(are) Recorders

translations.1: Famaien ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee Wa-innaa lahoo kaatiboon
translations.2: Faman yaAAmal mina alssalihati wahuwa muminun fala kufrana lisaAAyihi wainna lahu katiboona

words.translation: And (there is) prohibition|upon|a city|which We have destroyed|that they|not|will return

translations.1: Wa-haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon
translations.2: Waharamun AAala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarjiAAoona

words.translation: Until|when|has been opened|(for) the Yajuj|and Majuj|and they|from|every|elevation|descend

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa futihat Ya'jooju Wa-Ma'jooju Wa-hum min kulli hadabien yansiloon
translations.2: Hatta itha futihat yajooju wamajooju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiloona

words.translation: And has approached|the promise|[the] true|then behold|[it]|(are) staring|(the) eyes|(of) those who|disbelieved|O woe to us!|Verily|we had been|in|heedlessness|of|this|nay|we were|wrongdoers

translations.1: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatin min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen
translations.2: Waiqtaraba alwaAAdu alhaqqu faitha hiya shakhisatun absaru allatheena kafaroo ya waylana qad kunna fee ghaflatin min hatha bal kunna thalimeena

words.translation: Indeed, you|and what|you worship|besides Allah|besides Allah|besides Allah|(are) firewood|(of) Hell|You|to it|will come

translations.1: Innakum Wa-maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon
translations.2: Innakum wama taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi hasabu jahannama antum laha waridoona

words.translation: If|were|these|gods|not|they (would) have come to it|And all|therein|will abide forever

translations.1: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatan maa waradoohaa Wa-kullun feehaa khaalidoon
translations.2: Law kana haolai alihatan ma waradooha wakullun feeha khalidoona

words.translation: For them|therein|(is) sighing|and they|therein|not|will hear

translations.1: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-hum feehaa laa yasma'oon
translations.2: Lahum feeha zafeerun wahum feeha la yasmaAAoona

words.translation: Indeed|those|has gone forth|for them|from Us|the good|those|from it|(will be) removed far

translations.1: Innal lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal husnaaa ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon
translations.2: Inna allatheena sabaqat lahum minna alhusna olaika AAanha mubAAadoona

words.translation: Not|they will hear|(the) slightest sound of it|and they|in|what|desire|their souls|will abide forever

translations.1: Laa yasma'oona hasee-sahaa Wa-hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon
translations.2: La yasmaAAoona haseesaha wahum fee ma ishtahat anfusuhum khalidoona

words.translation: Not|will grieve them|the terror|[the] greatest|and will meet them|the Angels|This|(is) your Day|which|you were|promised

translations.1: Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru Wa-tatalaq-qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon
translations.2: La yahzunuhumu alfazaAAu alakbaru watatalaqqahumu almalaikatu hatha yawmukumu allathee kuntum tooAAadoona

words.translation: (The) Day|We will fold|the heaven|like (the) folding|(of) a scroll|for records|As|We began|(the) first|creation|We will repeat it|a promise|upon Us|Indeed We|We are|(the) Doers

translations.1: Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naa awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen
translations.2: Yawma natwee alssamaa katayyi alssijlli lilkutubi kama badana awwala khalqin nuAAeeduhu waAAdan AAalayna inna kunna faAAileena

words.translation: And verily|We have written|in|the Scripture|after|after|the mention|that|the earth|will inherit it|My slaves|the righteous

translations.1: Wa-laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori min ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadi-yas saalihoon
translations.2: Walaqad katabna fee alzzaboori min baAAdi alththikri anna alarda yarithuha AAibadiya alssalihoona

words.translation: Indeed|in|this|surely is a Message|for a people|worshippers

translations.1: Inna fee haaza labalaa-ghal liqawmin 'aabideen
translations.2: Inna fee hatha labalaghan liqawmin AAabideena

words.translation: And not|We have sent you|but|(as) a mercy|for the worlds

translations.1: Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa rahmatal lil'aalameen
translations.2: Wama arsalnaka illa rahmatan lilAAalameena

words.translation: Say|Only|it is revealed|to me|that|your god|(is) God|One|so will|you|submit (to Him)

translations.1: Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal antum muslimoon
translations.2: Qul innama yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antum muslimoona

words.translation: But if|they turn away|then say|I (have) announced to you|equally|equally|And not|I know|whether is near|or|far|what|you are promised

translations.1: Fa-in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; Wa-in adreee aqareebun am ba'eedun maa too'adoon
translations.2: Fain tawallaw faqul athantukum AAala sawain wain adree aqareebun am baAAeedun ma tooAAadoona

words.translation: Indeed He|knows|the declared|[of]|[the] speech|and He knows|what|you conceal

translations.1: Innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli Wa-ya'lamu maa taktumoon
translations.2: Innahu yaAAlamu aljahra mina alqawli wayaAAlamu ma taktumoona

words.translation: And not|I know|perhaps it may be|a trial|for you|and an enjoyment|for|a time

translations.1: Wa-in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum Wa-mataa'un ilaa heen
translations.2: Wain adree laAAallahu fitnatun lakum wamataAAun ila heenin

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|judge|in truth|And our Lord|(is) the Most Gracious|the One Whose help is sought|against|what|you attribute

translations.1: Qaala Rabbih kum bil-haqq; Wa-Rabbunar Rahmaa-nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon
translations.2: Qala rabbi ohkum bialhaqqi warabbuna alrrahmanu almustaAAanu AAala ma tasifoona
